text: Carlos Diego Mesa Gisbert (born August 12, 1953) is a Bolivian politician and journalist. He was President of Bolivia from 2003 to 2005. He was vice president of Bolivia from August 2002 to October 2003.Vicepresidency of Bolivia He unsuccessfully ran for president again in 2020. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Bolivia Category:Vice presidents of Bolivia Category:Bolivian journalists
title: Carlos Mesa
